@@ -758,0 +758,6 @@ + *

  • In Perl, free-spacing mode (which is called comments + * mode in this class) denoted by {@code (?x)} will not ignore whitespace + * inside of character classes. In this class, whitespace inside of character + * classes must be escaped to be considered as part of the regular expression + * when in comments mode.

    • + * @@ -819,1 +825,3 @@ - * with {@code #} are ignored until the end of a line. + * with {@code #} are ignored until the end of a line. Comments mode ignores + * whitespace within a character class contained in a pattern string. Such + * whitespace must be escaped in order to be considered significant.
